website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive 20 ounce water bottle for dogs can hold any standard water bottle.
pros: Comes in several colors and a smaller size for smaller dogs
Does a decent job of not leaking
A good value and easier than carrying a bowl
cons: The design of this model does not allow you to tip unused water back into the bottle
The clip could be better designed

customer_reviews.title: Great product, perfect for long walks with my corgi
customer_reviews.text: Great product, perfect for long walks with my corgi. The only thing I found it was lacking is that the bottle part can freely swing in and out of the dish piece. This is sometimes annoying while holding it. The good news is that I found that if you take a rubber charity-style bracelet and put it around the bottle part, this fixes the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great water dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Used one of these Gulpy water dispensers for 10 years with our previous boxer. It is very convenient to always have water supply and does not leak. We purchased 2 more for our new boxer puppies. This is perfect to carry in hot humid Florida. It's very easy for dogs to use and even share.I recommend this for anyone who has dogs.
customer_reviews.author: vrs

customer_reviews.title: The best travel water bottles I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: I love these gulpy water dispensers. So much I have the 20 oz and the 10 oz. Both are the same, just the size is different. One thing to note is you can not thread int a standard water bottle into the holder. I found this to be disappointing because a long day out will require to pour from a water bottle into this bottle. Not a deal breaker, it just would have been a lot more user friendly if it was interchangeable with standard disposable water bottles. In the photo you'll see the 20 ounce size in the color green, where the 10 ounce version is the color blue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Truly awesome water device for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Gulpy is awesome, most dog owners who see it for the first time have the same opinion. Easy to hold and dispense water for your thirsty dog. Also multifunctional given it can easily be a water bottle for yourself. In the past for hikes I would carry some type of bowl for my dog, but with the Gulpy that isn't an issue. Only suggestion I have is to make the latch a little softer and possibly wider. Carrying the thing by the latch seems to be hard on certain fingers due to size, and the latch can be wearisome given the hard plastic over time. I just wrapped some soft padding on mines, which eliminated this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Adam P.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: You can even use it with a regular water bottle!
customer_reviews.text: You can use a regular old plastic water bottle with this instead of the hard plastic one it comes with. This means even greater versatility. Throw a couple water bottles in the car on longer trips and you'll not have to worry about where to get water refills. And yes - other reviews are correct that the drinking trough is somewhat slender. So of you have a large breed dog or a dog with large mouth or muzzle the logistics of the product might not be the best drinking experience for your big dog. Medium to small muzzle/mouth dogs - this is by far the best choice.
customer_reviews.author: Elmie

customer_reviews.title: Champ Bailey Gives the Gulpy Water Dispenser 5 Woofs
customer_reviews.text: Champ Bailey my cocker spaniel has report back to me that he wishes to give this water dispenser 5 Stars. I totally agree with him. Once I figured out I didn’t have to unscrew the top/bowl all the way off, I could fill the dispenser easily. I am obsessive about him drinking from his Gulpy because I have read some horror stories about dogs who have become quite ill from drinking “stale” e.g. water that has sat around in a bowl without being changed like at a dog park. Champ recognizes his water dispenser and when he sees me fill it, his tail begins to wag. I think he is genetically linked to one of Pavlov’s dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Maum

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle with just a few design flaws I wish I could change
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is great for giving water to your dog while you're on-the-go like on a walk or hike but I wish there were a few design changes. First off, it's hard to stand the bottle upright because the outer dispenser makes it lopsided. Maybe if the bottle part was shaped with an indent that would make the bottom of the bottle flush with the green dispenser part, that might make it work better. Also, if you pour out too much water into the dispenser, there's no way to get it back into the bottle so that's a little bit frustrating. Overall, I really like the bottle though and recommend it to any dog owner.
customer_reviews.author: Beka Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Convenient way to hydrate doggo on hikes
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Gulpy dispensers for several years. I have previously bought the smaller ones (aptly called Gulpy Jr.) because they would fit in my bottle holster on my hiking pack. Well, this one fits, too, because it's just as narrow. My dog likes drinking out of the little trough when we're out walking or hiking. She has thick hair and really feels the heat and humidity, and the larger Gulpy provides her with all the water she needs. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AnnLD

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed - did not last two months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for a new puppy and the one I've been using stopped working yesterday, after less than two months of use. it no longer dispenses water at all. The one I had before lasted for more than 10 years before I dropped it on asphalt and it broke. Very, very disappointed since I was a big fan of the product and had recommended it to any of my friends that had a dog and purchased several for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: P. Felton

customer_reviews.title: Good concept, inadequate design
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept, my dog loves to drink out of this. However the design of the clip needs to be revisited. We usually like to secure it to our backpacks/belts while walking/hiking. The clip is too short and we have lost two of these dispensers because it is so darn difficult to secure it and as such falls out easily. Tempted to buy another one, but will have to pass it for something else that has a better design that is easy to carry, disengage for use and secure back after use.
customer_reviews.author: CosmicIllusion

customer_reviews.title: I would like to give this a 5 star but only 3 due to lack of durability
customer_reviews.text: I would like to give this a 5 star but only 3 due to lack of durability. If you drop this one on a hard surface the top breaks rendering the device useless. I pull the water bottle out then my dog sees something and jerks the leash, and oops I drop the bottle, and poof, broken. It is the flip lid that breaks. I think I am on my 5th Gulpy and looking for something better and more durable. I would pay mor eif the product were more substantial. Maybe come out with a heavy duty version. Otherwise I will have to switch to a competitor.
customer_reviews.author: Ross E Yakulis

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, but a little drippy
customer_reviews.text: It's simple and easy to use and the dogs seem to enjoy drinking from it. For the price, it's a great option. Quibbles: If the dogs don't drink up every drop, you have to dump the excess. It's tricky to do that and close it without spilling on your own hand or shoe, or dripping over the sides of the bottle. To stand it up on a flat surface, you have to open the tray a couple inches.
customer_reviews.author: Jacktose

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy access to H2O during walks
customer_reviews.text: Don’t walk my dogs without their water bottle. Very nice detail is the flip down water ‘dish’ that fills easily with a slight squeeze of the attached water bottle. Don’t take my dogs for a walk without the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: H. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Just squeeze it!
customer_reviews.text: My sister bought one for our dogs and I purchased this one as a gift. If you travel with your pet, this is so much easier than dragging out the dishes and wasting water. It takes a few tries for the dogs to use it well. Once they get the hang of it, you won't leave home without it. It is too bulky to fit in the cup holder in the console but fits in the door of both of our cars. It is easy to refill at water fountains or with bottled water.
customer_reviews.author: E. Sidbury

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Nice portable water dispenser for my dogs. I mostly use it when I take my pups out for walks during the warm/hot weather months, but I've also used it occasionally for long car rides. I throw this into my bag and it doesn't leak or spill, which is awesome since it makes it easier to carry. I prefer using this dispenser over pouring water into one of those collapsible plastic bowls (its so much more convenient and far less messy).
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Failed after 5 hours
customer_reviews.text: After only two uses, less than 5 hours, this water dispenser for dogs failed. On a very hot day the water started leaking without any possibility of stopping the leak. BUYER BEWARE. UNFORTUNATELY, THE WATERFIELD JUST A FEW DAYS AFTER THE AMAZON 30 DAY RETURN POLICY.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor I.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but wish they made a stainless steel version for more durability
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Gulpy that I've bought. The first one lasted 7 years but eventually the long bowl part came apart rendering it useless because it wouldn't stay on the bottle. And it wouldn't cover the opening where the water came out. But this second one has been great so far. People always think it's cool whenever I whip it out to give my puppy a drink. They are so amazed. Haha I just wished they made a stainless steel version. I think it would make it so much more durable and last against being tossed on occasion.
customer_reviews.author: BonnieB

customer_reviews.title: Handy Water Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I received a smaller one of these in a Bark Box and have found it very useful. I ordered the larger size by accident, but we leave it in the truck in case we need it. Recently we took a short road trip and the dog would not drink out of one of those fold up water pouches. I purchased this to have on hand because she'll drink out of it. We normally have bottled water with us so we don't have to worry about keeping this bottle full of water. We just pour our bottled water into the part so she can drink out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ga Mtn PeachTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Clever design, well made
customer_reviews.text: We took this on a camping trip and it came in really handy both in the car and while at the campsite and hiking. We also carried it in a saddle bag while on a trail ride when the dogs came along. It is a clever design and easy to fill and dispense. The only drawback, if you are having to carry a lot of water, is its somewhat awkward to pour the un-drunk water back into the bottle. But if water is limited, you can make this work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Kinda leaky
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I'm missing something but it doesn't seem like there's anyway to actually close the water bottle. It's fine if kept upright. It doesn't leak a whole lot but enough you have to be careful to keep it upright. It works. Dog figured it out pretty quickly. I just wish it had some "twist to close" function.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pike

customer_reviews.title: foldable bowls+bottle etc for the times when my best friend and I go for really long walks
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a mix of poop-bags, foldable bowls+bottle etc for the times when my best friend and I go for really long walks. All these options works but need some work and sometimes (poop bags) requires 2 hands which you may not have when you need to hold the retractable leash. This water dispenser is _the_ best solution I've found. Just carry it like any water bottle and when said best friend is thirsty take it out, flip it open and squeeze. No training needed as the flow of water immediately tells my friend that this is for drinking!
customer_reviews.author: The Silicon Valley Geek

customer_reviews.title: It's great to have along on walks and in the car ...
customer_reviews.text: My sister in law gave me one but it fell out of the refrigerator and cracked so ordered another. I am more careful with this one. It's great to have along on walks and in the car for our puppy. She took to it right away. It's a little awkward to carry and can't really be attached to anything so has to be carried.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: On the go water dispenser for pets
customer_reviews.text: I would not leave home without it now. Clip onto your belt loop and away you go. Convenient when walking your pet, easy way for pets to get a drink. fast shipping. I highly recommend this product. Your pets will thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Patti b

customer_reviews.title: Functional.  Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: This enabled me to take my dog on my long training walks for the Camino. She learned quickly to drink from it. I was able to squeeze the water into the dish as she drank. So I didn't have to waste much water and only had to dump the little bit she didn't finish saving the rest in the bottle for further down the trail.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shonka

customer_reviews.title: Water & Bowl in One
customer_reviews.text: A friend clued me into this water bottle for dogs that has a drop down trough for dogs to drink from. Just squeeze the bottle and water flows into the scoop-shaped trough and the dog can drink it while you hold. This eliminates the need for a water bowl. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Teacher

customer_reviews.title: The idea is good but the quality isn't there
customer_reviews.text: It works well enough but made using cheap material. The week after I got it, it slipped out of my hand, landed on the sidewalk and the orange plastic part cracked into pieces. The idea is good but the quality isn't there. Buying a different brand to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Afana

customer_reviews.title: Nice size but not made to (literally) hold up
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of this product because it held more water for longer walking trips. However, ironically that was it's design downfall. The casing/water-well (particularly the belt hook) is not made to handle the additional weight. Therefore, after using it a few times it broke off (see pic). Now due to the hole, the water-well leaks too! Better to be dollar wise than penny foolish (unlike me!) and buy the metal (stainless steel) version. It is only slightly more in price but will likely to be much more durable and last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Megan F.

customer_reviews.title: Great portable H2O solution for dog walking
customer_reviews.text: This is a great solution for walking your dog in the heat. Compact. Easy-to-use and holds plenty of H2O. My dog has gotten to the point that he recognizes that I have it and looks at my pocket where I keep it when he's thirsty! Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Good unit
customer_reviews.text: I use 3 water bottles when walking my very large dog on our 4 1/2 mile walks. This bottle is great to use. We get a lot of stares. My dog will not walk without his water bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Nan I. Fitz Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love your product... but my puppy not so much. He doesn’t like it and won’t drink from it. I dunno? He’s weird. Only thing I haven’t liked is that it will unlock itself while I’m walking with it attached to my purse strap. Easy solution with an elastic but it’s a little annoying. Someone at our local dog park keeps it in his cargo pockets for the same reason. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: RayMarEme

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea. I bought this for my rotty puppy ...
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea. I bought this for my rotty puppy to use during obedience classes. She took right to it. It's really easy to fill and no spills when you attach the bottle. I carry it in my purse and there have been no leaks. When it's time for puppy to drink from it, you physically have to squeeze it to get the water to come out which is awesome. My only complaint is I can't get it to stand up on it's own so I have to bend down and hold it up while she's drinking out of it. No biggie though, definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: ccch136

customer_reviews.title: Broke in first use
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made, sat upright on table and table shook, it fell over and the top broke right off. Can't return so I'll throw it away. It's cheap plastic, so lousy for the environment anyway. Will get an environmentally friendlier one now.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend this product over the other stainless steel style for ...
customer_reviews.text: My other Gulpy broke after I dropped it (granted it was at least 5 years old so the plastic was more brittle) and this replacement worked as well as my other Gulpy. I chose this model since the "cup" is attached and doesn't require screwing it off to use it. When my dog wants water and sees you going for the Gulpy, that extra 3 seconds does make a difference (to my dog). I'd recommend this product over the other stainless steel style for that reason alone
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent concept, poorly executed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent concept, poorly executed. Perhaps it might be acceptable for occasional use. 1. Cheap rigid plastic top broke off. 2. The mechanism that allows the water bottle to swivel shuts off the water supply. When the opening should be open, allowing water to flow into the tray, it swivels to the closed position. The water bottle must be unscrewed and water then dispensed into the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Allingham

customer_reviews.title: Despite the shortcomings it is still great to have and we use it all the time!
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking water on a walk/hike. Stanley (our lab) drinks from it easily. We keep a rubber band around it when carrying it attached to a belt because it tends to open with the weight of the water. There should have been some mechanism designed to keep it secure. Also no way to return water to the bottle if your pet doesn't drink all the water that was squeezed out. Despite the shortcomings it is still great to have and we use it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Max55

customer_reviews.title: Great for long, hot walks
customer_reviews.text: Great for when I take my dog on long walks in the summer and he gets thirsty. I had to add a carabiner to make it easier to hold though, since the hole at the top is a bit small to hold with your hand or finger. There is also a clip for your belt, but a full water bottle is a bit too heavy for that. Only downside is that once you squirt the water out, if my dog decides he isn't thirsty anymore, you have to dump the water (can't go back in the bottle). Overall would recommend though!
customer_reviews.author: Teemoe

customer_reviews.title: A good drink!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these as they're very convenient to keep in the cars. The one thing that could be improved is if they could be made to balance while sitting on the ground. They tend to roll over. I had another brand very similar that did. This brand does not leak like the other brand though so that part of the system is much better. Also, a clip would be nice too. I would buy these again because the price is right. If you're not picky on color, the price is even better.
customer_reviews.author: PhylR

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Great water option for your dog while you're on the go. Its much easier than carrying a bowl and having to set it up, fill it up, and then throw out what they don't drink. You just flip out the "bowl", squeeze out some water, and let your dog drink. Our dog and our friend's dog love it with much less waste. Only draw back is that if you'll have to carry a water bottle for your dog as well as yourself, as opposed to being able to share the same bottle when you have a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: tallhapa

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because Im occasionally driving with my dog. This is so convenient during road trips, because I just squirt out how much I think my dog needs in the compartment and then put it away after he's done. Fits right on my cup holders too! Also very handy when I take him on walk at dog parks. I just put it in my gym bag, and take it out whenever he needs a drink of water. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for traveling or walks
customer_reviews.text: This works great for when you are traveling with your dog or taking him for walk. The only con is that you have to dump any water that you squeezed out and your dog didn't drink. Other than that, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: George the Pen

customer_reviews.title: Quantity Misleading - Low quality plastic - Great concept but must treat them gently.  Never drop.
customer_reviews.text: Picture shows 4 and expected to buy 4. Other purchasing options showed picture with only 1 - So I assumed that the picture of 4 was to buy 4. Nothing told me the quantity being purchased on either the option for 4 or the option for 1. Been using these for over a decade. Great concept. They can last a long time if treated gently. But they are made of a poor quality, rigid plastic that easily cracks and breaks when dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once and the paint panel on the bottle came off and I had yellow paint all over my hand. Makes me nervous to use it with my dog again if the paint comes off. I was so excited because someone at the dog park had one and it worked great
customer_reviews.author: ciera creacy

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go
customer_reviews.text: Great for on the go. Easy to carry, fill and use. I fill this with water the morning before dog class, 4-H meetings or whenever I'll be on the go with my dogs. I bought two because the first one was a hit. I put these in an insulated lunch bag with ice blocks to keep the water cold for hot, thirsty dogs. I do however also bring along an empty milk jug of water to refill these as my dogs are big and drink a lot. I found this product recommended by another person's review and I'm very greatful for that person's opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Dog DazeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Gulpy Water and New Angle Pet
customer_reviews.text: This review is both for the water bottle and the customer service. The water bottles are fantastic. They are light-weight, can be clipped to your belt/pants, and can release the water by a simple squeeze. The price is also great. I messaged the company as soon as I placed the order to let them know which color I want (I really wanted a specific color) and they emailed me to let me know that they didn't see my message before sending the bottle out. They sent a replacement bottle quickly with no questions asked. I will definitely support this store again in the future and recommend their products to others.
customer_reviews.author: Millet

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for travel - long trips or just around town!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this water bottle in anticipation of a long road trip, and it worked extremely well! It's nice and compact and didn't leak at all when it was closed. Our beagle had no problems drinking out of it. Since then, we've taken it with us any time we're out and about, and have had no problems with it! It's really nice to have water and a bowl for him to drink out of readily available. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who takes their dog out with them in town or for longer drives.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Not Great for Multiple Dogs - Better Suited for Hiking
customer_reviews.text: I thought this seemed like a smart design so I purchased one to use at the dog park. Unfortunately, it won't accommodate more than one dog - a dog bowl still works better. It probably would be good for hiking, though. I do like the clip for hanging on the belt or waist pack and the reservoir works pretty well for one small dog (not sure how a large dog would work.)
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Poor-quality product
customer_reviews.text: The mechanism that holds the water in when the device is in a closed position can very easily slip into an open position and leak. It also can slip into a closed position when the device is meant to be open and feeding water to the trough. Not easy to repair out in the field while in use and any repair that is done doesn't stay repaired. I was very unsatisfied with this product and would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Kinkade

customer_reviews.title: My little Yorkie loves her Gulpies when we travel or ...
customer_reviews.text: My little Yorkie loves her Gulpies when we travel or stroll. I took away one star because they don't stay watertight for long. After a few months of us you have to make sure they stay upright or carry a regular water bottle with its own top and just put it on the gulpy when you need it. It's not a huge problem to me though. We have both green and yellow gulpies and keep one in the truck and one in the car. Then we take bottled water with us when we leave home,
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Gulpy trumps water bowl!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is dynamite, and I can't believe it took me so long to discover it. Our small lab took to it like a duck to, well, water. Given the choice, she'll go for her Gulpy before her water bowl. No problems with breaking after some months of use - it seems sturdy enough. When just hooked over my waistband, it's a bit awkward to carry when full, and perhaps I'd do better with the smaller version. But stashed in the car, it's perfect for dog parks and road trips. Truly a great invention.
customer_reviews.author: AuntPitta

customer_reviews.title: Trixie is my thirsty, rambuncious, most adorable little Jack Russell Terrier
customer_reviews.text: Since, the hot weather is upon us and Trixie & I still walk almost everywhere we can in S.F. We've got to shop for grocerites and run errands , I make sure to have her a water along ,but would forget how to have a bowl ready. Well, she took one look at it and stopped dead and ignored the new water gadget. Remembering my alpha training skills ,I acted like I was drinking from it 1st. And then she was fine drinking fron it and I leave it out as an extra water source so that when I grab it to go ,she's cool w/it. And its no bigger tham a bottle of soda
customer_reviews.author: RixBig8nSF

customer_reviews.title: Must Read!!
customer_reviews.text: Here's the scoop. The container is a good size, easy to use, clean etc. Why can't I recommend one? It appears that it can stand on it's own in the advertisement and doesn't. It's not flat on the other side of the drinking trough. If you want to place it on the ground it rocks and falls over. We like to take our pups to eat with us and I wanted a bottle that I could set up and walk away from. This is not that. It's great if you are hiking and holding it for your dog for a quick water break. That's about it. I wish I hadn't wasted my money. Just depends on what your needs are.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect water dispenser and carrier
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, portability is great! Perfect for hikes with the dogs or a walk, anywhere you bring your best friend (dog). He loves it and it's easy to have the water and dish all in one! Would recommend for those travelers and their thirsty dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking and works for car travel with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for hiking and works for car travel with the dog too. You can hook it on your belt with a carbine style clip, fit it in a small hiking pack, and it fits in a basic car cup holder too. The valve closes pretty securely, I suppose it could leak if it was upside down for awhile - but it's easy to carry it upright. It's tricky to put water back into the bottle from the tray so I usually just squeeze out a little at a time as opposed to filling up the tray and then finding out the dog isn't that thirsty.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah Mayfair

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT stand on its own.
customer_reviews.text: Look...... the water tray will NOT stand up on its own. The bottom is curved and will roll right over. So.. if you're at the dog park, forget just putting it down for your or other dogs to use. You have to HOLD it for you dog to drink. That is a HUGE pain in the butt. Its ok for walks and you can just give the dog a drink when he needs it,... but why not just get a bottle that has a FLAT tray. There are way better alternatives... I gave mine away.
customer_reviews.author: Kafka45

customer_reviews.title: Does not accept standard water bottles as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Description: "Will also accept standard water bottles" is a lie.
customer_reviews.author: musiquest

customer_reviews.title: Review of Gulpy
customer_reviews.text: Gulpy Water dispenser is clumsy to use, requiring both hands to dispense water. Also, significant pressure is required to dispense the water. I am back to my own bottle and plastic bowl so that once I fill the water bowl, I can stand up and enjoy the scenery while my dog gets a drink of water.
customer_reviews.author: B. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Holds Up Well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to Use Holds Up Well. This is a very simple easy to use dog water bottle. The bottle flips out of the drink tray and so doing opens the shut off valve, then you simply squeeze the bottle to fill the tray. We have had this over six months, use it daily on our walks and is a great "waterer" for the price. Addendum: The water tray cracked after well over a year of daily use and numerous drops on pavement etc. I immediately purchased another and am 100% satisfied with the service life we got from the first one.Still 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Maile's Boss

customer_reviews.title: only way to hike with dogs
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these Gulpy's and when we go hiking at a county park a few miles from my home I carry one and give my dogs a chance to drink every 15 minutes or so. They drink from the plastic trough like they normally would a bowl and I squeeze the bottle to speed the water going into the trough, as they drink quickly. I keep the second in the car in a small cooler for them to cool down when the hike ius over. This is the best way I have found to keep the 3 of them hydrated in warm or any temperature, for that matter.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Teply

customer_reviews.title: These things are great
customer_reviews.text: I currently already had two of these gulpies (the smaller size though). I wanted to get something for family members pets and this is just perfect (so I bought 3 more). It makes taking and serving water in the car while driving or just about anywhere incredibly easy and mess free. Both of my dogs love it when we pull out the gulpy! We have had ours for over a year and they work as if they were brand new still. 5 Stars for a well executed travel water bottle for pets.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: Super Perfect solution for dogs on the go.... So nice to be able to "water" my Jack Russell in the car, without stopping (from the passenger seat, of course!)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Walter

customer_reviews.title: Delivery
customer_reviews.text: Product was fine. Driver just threw the package on the driveway from his vehicle. Should have gotten out and brought it to the door. No picture provided where the delivery landed.
customer_reviews.author: SKT

customer_reviews.title: You are better off cutting the base of a water bottle and ...
customer_reviews.text: Water trough part cracked after first week of use. You are better off cutting the base of a water bottle and slipping it over the base of similar intact water bottle. Pull off cut base and you have the same functionality as the Gulpy but it will cost you nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Gonopod1000

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my sister- she loves going for walks with her dogs. The product has the same color as pictured but it's kind of smaller than I had imagined. It is more narrow than what appears in the picture but it's still a good size for one dog on a nice short walk. I would definitely bring extra water bottles if you're planning on going out for an all day adventure. This bottle is more for walks in the park or a hot day on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great for trips or day excursions.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a water source for a trip with our two dogs. It performed as I hoped it would: no leaks, with the swing down bowl holding as much water as I chose to squeeze out of the bottle. Our dogs are on the small side, so I don't know if it would work as well for larger tongues, but the bottles come in different sizes and are, of course, refillable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Dog approved!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone with a dog needs a gulpy! We've been using these for years and love them. Replaced our old ones with the updated design. In addition to the waist clip, this updated bottle top now has a built-in loop at the top to make carrying fresh water for your dog even easier. Our dogs love their gulpys and the genius flip up/built-in "bowl" design couldn't make it any easier to keep them hydrated on walks. As usual, amazon prime was awesome... arrived a day earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyGirlUSA

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. Since I have a dog that drinks like a fish, this is very convenient for providing him with water when we are out and about. I do wish there is a way for it to stand up without me holding it, but it does serve the purpose I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: R K

customer_reviews.title: Great invention!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is extremely convenient and my dog loves to drink from it. My only concern is the plastic and what chemicals are leaching into the water. Also, I wish it came with a handle of some sort. There's a place to hook a carbiner but it doesn't come with one.
customer_reviews.author: Medium-Short Person

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and the park
customer_reviews.text: I think it is great! We got a new puppy who is constantly drinking so we take it everywhere, especially long car rides and the dog park now that they have turned off the water fountains for the winter. So far two 50-lb dogs can stick their faces in and get a drink at the same time :) (I also bring a bowl and gallon jug of water to the park for the general group but lots of paws get dipped in it) The four stars instead of five is only because when in car I have to hold it out the window to close it so I don't get dripped on.
customer_reviews.author: L. Merriam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution to the thirsty pup!
customer_reviews.text: This bottle is fantastic. We go on long walks that require us to provide our large breed dog ample water and this does the trick. He drinks right out of it with no issues. We will be buying another one so we can have extra water when we aren't able to refill it. Highly recommend for active dog walkers.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Kovacs

customer_reviews.title: Well made!!
customer_reviews.text: I picked up a cheap version of this at the pet store and it was totally horrible!! Leaked the first time I used it and ended up throwing it away after one weekend! This one is so very well constructed. It is easy to use and does not leak! Also it is strong! My Shih Tzu puppy tries to stand in the water part when she gets hot after puppy kindergarten class!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not For My Dog
customer_reviews.text: This product works ok, but is suitable only for tiny dogs, and only in environments where it is possible to anchor the water tray. The tray is not stable enough to place on the ground, or even on concrete, with the container up with valve in open position. It will be ok if the human can stabilize it, for example between two bricks, or by holding it. My dog weighs only 60 lbs., and knocks it over every time.
customer_reviews.author: John Campbell

customer_reviews.title: These are great for travel.
customer_reviews.text: I already had an 8 oz one so this is a bigger one for longer trips. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Codi

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was super handy to bring on road trips since we travel ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was super handy to bring on road trips since we travel alot, but for some reason my dog is afraid of it. I gave it to a friend for her dog and she loves it for walks and days at the park.
customer_reviews.author: sls6901

customer_reviews.title: But it's been pretty useful this far
customer_reviews.text: As a first time user, it took my dog a while to get used to. But it's been pretty useful this far. No leaks and it fits in my back pocket. Please note to thoroughly wash the bottle as it has a strong plastic smell that'll put off your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfred

customer_reviews.title: I have a husky and she always got so thirsty on our walks and it was annoying for me to have to carry a bag with ...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed for my long walks in this summer heat. I have a husky and she always got so thirsty on our walks and it was annoying for me to have to carry a bag with a water bottle AND a bowl for her, This bottle is really convenient since is has its own clip that I can just hook on my belt. My only complaint is that the hing where the "bowl" connects to the bottle is a little loose so it flops around. But that's something I can deal with. Over all a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I wish these came with "bigger" water bottles!!!! This beats one of those pop up travel water bowls by a long shot... we fill it up, pop it in the cooler...stays cool, attaches on a belt... We're off and have water for the dogs at our fingertips....I love this product.... One draw back is that the clip that holds on to your belt allows the bowl and bottle to disconnect...it has to be hand held or put in your back pack....if the bowl portion could just click to attach to the bottle....it would be then perfect...
customer_reviews.author: Pete in Fbg

customer_reviews.title: Leaks and is wasteful
customer_reviews.text: This bottle leaked on the first use. Also, you can't pour the water back into the bottle if your dog doesn't drink it. I wouldn't recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Rhodes, Award-Winning Author of The Freedom Code

customer_reviews.title: This is the ONLY way my dog will drink on the go
customer_reviews.text: My dog refused to drink from the small receptacles we used to pour water into when away from home. I don't know if the water was stagnant or what but the gulpy has solved our problems! It is handy to take on the go. The bottle pulls out. Squeeze the bottle to fill the reservoir with water and put it by the dog's mouth. The design makes it easy for the dog to lap up. The seal is solid and we have not had any leaking. It is easy to fill at water fountains if needed. For the record, I have a large golden retriever.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Best product for drinking dogs
customer_reviews.text: Great product! We take dogs out hiking with us and everyone brings their own watering system. All the dogs just love drinking out of this thing and I don't know why. At times I have three of them squeezing into the tray part. I carry three/four of them in a butt pack that weighs on your hips. If there was one improvement I would make it a better carrying system. If you're looking for a watering method for your dogs, This has been the best!!
customer_reviews.author: John Henry

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very poor design: it falls over when you place it on the ground emptying the little tray.
customer_reviews.author: BudK

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy another
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the color I orders so I wished they wouldn't give me the option. I'm still giving it 5 stars because we use it every day. It doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a dog owner. We always ...
customer_reviews.text: A must have for a dog owner. We always fill it up when we go for a walk or excercise. One thing is that the bottle doesn't stand upright because the cover covers the bottom of the bottle. You can open the cover a little bit to expose the bottom of the bottle, so that the bottle stands up, however.
customer_reviews.author: Mashi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Exactly what I was working for. A little pricey if you ask me.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, No Leaking
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all. This product works well. When not in use, the water does not leak at all. My small puppy took to it straight away. It does not sit on the ground on it's own very well, so you do have to hold it while your dog drinks from it. It has a loop on the top end for attaching it things and a clip for your belt.I would highly recommend this product for keeping your dog hydrated on the go!
customer_reviews.author: CassNC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The Gulpy water dispenser is our favorite dispenser. We've tried a few options for watering our dogs on walks. It is easy to use, just flip it open and squeeze. Both of our dogs drink out of it at the same time. It does not need to be assembled each time you give your dogs water like some of the other products.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Slightly small, but gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but a little small for my bullmastiff's needs. It's kind of hard to use because I have to squeeze the bottle in order for the water to come out at an acceptable pace. I have carpal tunnel so that tends to make my wrists and hands hurt. Other than that though, I really appreciate this product!
customer_reviews.author: hwatts

customer_reviews.title: Good but awkward for running
customer_reviews.text: Great concept but not the right fit for you if you're a runner. It's super awkward to hold and too heavy to clip. I have also tried tying a band to it to allow it to hang down but it always pops open or hits me a ton. If you're a walker or hiker this will probably work!
customer_reviews.author: Jill S

customer_reviews.title: Works great and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Works great and convenient. We take it to the dog park to give him something to drink after playing with dogs. It was easy for us and our dog to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Amber HTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to order this 20 oz. one since it was cheaper than the 10 oz. It's great to take on hikes, walks, or wherever. My malitpoo is small (10 lbs) and this works great for her. The tray is a little wobbly, so you'll have to hold it as you squeeze the water from the bottle. It has an attachment clip should you need to clip it to your waistbelt or backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great idea!
customer_reviews.text: I take my dog with me pretty much everywhere I go and must always have water in the car for him. I used to have to unscrew a jug of water and pour it into a bowl for him. This water bottle is very cool. Just flip down the flange and squeeze the bottle, and presto, a little bowl of water for him. I squeeze the bottle for as long as he wants to drink. Just got back from a 10 day road trip, and it sure made pit/ refreshment stops quicker and easier. I'm very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work Great!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Makes travel so much easier.. I will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenience but leaks
customer_reviews.text: Convenience but it leaks Not a huge issue bc of the smart hanger grip
customer_reviews.author: SUJIKIM

customer_reviews.title: I ordered another one because I really liked the first one
customer_reviews.text: I had a Gulpy Dispenser for many years prior to it falling out of the car and breaking. So, I ordered another one because I really liked the first one. Just like about everything else--it is much more cheaply made and the bottle does not screw into the dispenser correctly. It will continue to rotate past the point of actually being sealed so it is a guessing game as to when it is completely tightened and sealed. Go a little too far and you are starting over. Not worth returning and getting a replacement that probably does the same thing!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Stark

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: I take my dog out with my bikecicle, so, she does a lot of exercise. I put the glupy bottle in my bike's bottle holder with no problem. it fit's perfect on the holder and stays secure. My dog loves the glupy bottle too. I can give her all the water she wants. I wold recomend this to anyone. if you have a big dog that drinks a lot of watter, maybe should get a bigger bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for any dog that leaves the house or yard
customer_reviews.text: Every one should own one of these for their dogs if they take them anywhere. It is an easy way to have water available for your pet without making a mess. Our first one broke when my husband dropped it. Couldn't live without it as we take the dogs hiking, camping and to soccer games. Everyone always comments on it and asks us what it is called and where to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Picky CO Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, the dog picked up on it pretty quick. He is big so I have to carry a jug to refill it if we will be out for long. You get some spillage as the dog drinks, but I get the same when he drinks out of the water bowl. My dog is medium to large, for an extra large dog it might be too small to get their tongue in.
customer_reviews.author: S. Swoch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect option for hiking with your dog.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome water bottle for keeping your dog hydrated on hikes and long walks. My dog preferred this to the collapsible bowls I had been using. Its also easier to manage how much water your dog might be drinking so that they don't walk away with a half-full bowl of water. Or end up knocking over the bowl when your miles from a refill.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these and bought this as a gift. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy travel
customer_reviews.text: Do you take your dog out on walks or out for exploration? This is a easy transportable water bottle for my dog, its light and easy to store. The only problem I had was leaving the bottle unattended and the water just kept draining out and eventually filled and spilled over the "bowl" siding. Overall good purchase and glad I have it. I was actually recommended by another friend and she loves hers for her dogs as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Snowden

customer_reviews.title: great idea. works great
customer_reviews.text: great idea. works great. a little fragile. this is my second one. was given first one. broke belt hook off of it trying to unhook it. other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: jimi-sue

product_meta.title: Gulpy Water Dispenser for Dogs
product_meta.description: Color:BlueWhenever you are out with your companion, carry your Gulpy Water Dispenser. With a flip of the wrist you can give your best friend a fresh drink of water. Take your pet for a hike, run or overnight trip and carry along the Gulpy water and bowl in this all-in-one, lightweight, leak-proof water bottle and dispenser.
feature_bullets: Just squeeze the bottle and water fills the tray, ready to be lapped up by one thirsty dog
Water bottle's leak proof design nests into water tray when not in use
Just flip to open, flip to close
Will also accept standard water bottles

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
